channel.title: Computer Vision on Introduction
channel.description: Recent content in Computer Vision on Introduction

item.title: Downloading & Extracting Video Frames in R & Python
item.description: Video Analytics I had a recent project proposal in which I was to do something very interesting with data and rather than download some data set to work with I thought it be fun to work on something new. For some time I have been interested in getting into computer vision and now that I build and fly drones merging the two just seems inevitable. So I spent the last weekend learning how to work with this, most of it in python and then a little bit of it in R for fun.
